Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won by 5 wickets (with 10 balls remaining)
Post-Match Reflections: Kusal Mendis: 'Very happy today. We did really well in everything.'
Scott Edwards: 'We didn't start well. We got ourselves to a pretty competitive total.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka's ninth on the points table
Netherlands fought back from being in a hole but weren't good enough eventually
Others: Amish: 'Sri Lanka wasted a chance to improve net run rate by slowing down too much in late overs.'
